item.title: 迪斯尼和 DirecTV 力争在 NFL 赛季前续约
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼公司和卫星电视供应商 DirecTV 正在争分夺秒地争取在当前协议于周日到期之前续签发行协议。【原文：Walt Disney and satellite TV provider DirecTV are racing to renew their distribution agreement before the current pact expires on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国市场监管部门称电子商务巨头阿里巴巴已完成三年 "整改期"。
item.description: 中国国家市场监督管理总局周五发表声明称，阿里巴巴集团在 2021 年因垄断行为被罚款后已完成三年 "整改"。【原文：China's State Administration of Market Regulation issued a statement on Friday saying Alibaba Group had completed three years "rectification" following a fine levied in 2021 for monopolistic behaviour.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯工会称钢铁领导层危机使出售面临风险
item.description: 德国企业集团蒂森克虏伯公司的劳资协议会负责人周五表示，蒂森克虏伯计划出售其钢铁业务，但由于该部门领导层出现危机，出售计划面临不确定性风险。【原文：Thyssenkrupp's planned sale of its steel business is at risk over uncertainy following a leadership crisis at the unit, the German conglomerate's works council head said on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，SIX 集团正在探索金融信息部门的备选方案
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，瑞士证券市场运营商 SIX 集团正在权衡其金融信息部门的各种选择，包括可能与另一家公司合并。【原文：Swiss stock market operator SIX Group is weighing options for its financial information unit, including potentially merging it with another player, according to three people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: PDD 与中国其他大型电子商务公司相比有何优势？
item.description: 本周早些时候，中国最大的电子商务公司--阿里巴巴、JD.com 和 PDD Holdings--的股票遭到抛售，原因是担心低价供应商 PDD 承诺为提供折扣投入更多资金后，这些公司的利润率会受到压力。【原文：Shares of China's biggest e-commerce companies - Alibaba , JD.com and PDD Holdings - were dumped earlier this week on worries about pressure on their margins after low-price vendor PDD pledged to invest more for offering discounts.】

item.title: 问克劳德？亚马逊求助于 Anthropic 的人工智能来改造 Alexa
item.description: 五位熟知内情的人士告诉路透社，亚马逊将于 10 月份美国假日季前发布的改版 Alexa 将主要由 Anthropic 的 Claude 人工智能模型提供支持，而不是由亚马逊自己的人工智能提供支持。【原文：Amazon's revamped Alexa due for release in October ahead of the U.S. holiday season will be powered primarily by Anthropic's Claude artificial intelligence models, rather than its own AI, five people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国监管机构称特斯拉北京将召回 870 辆进口 Model X 电动汽车
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五表示，特斯拉汽车公司（Tesla Motors Beijing）将从10月8日起召回870辆进口Model X汽车，原因是需要检查用于固定车顶的粘合剂，该粘合剂可能存在安全隐患。【原文：China's market regulator said on Friday that Tesla Motors Beijing will recall 870 imported Model X vehicles from Oct. 8 due to a need to check the adhesive used to attach the roof of the vehicles which may pose a safety hazard.】

item.title: 受国际旅游放缓和国内供过于求影响，中国顶级航空公司出现亏损
item.description: 受国际旅游反弹慢于预期、国内供过于求以及全球航空运力回升导致竞争更加激烈的影响，中国主要国有航空公司上半年出现亏损。【原文：China's leading state-owned airlines posted losses in the first half of the year, weighed down by a slower-than-expected international travel rebound, domestic oversupply and more intense competition as aviation capacity returns globally.】

item.title: 消息人士称中国国有银行在人民币快速升值之际买入美元
item.description: 四位知情人士称，大型国有银行周五在中国在岸外汇市场买入美元，以减缓人民币升值。【原文：Major state-owned banks were buying dollars in China's onshore foreign exchange market on Friday to slow down a rising yuan, four people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国 2024、2025 年房价前景恶化
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于中国政府的支持政策难以帮助房地产行业找到底部，今明两年中国房价的下跌速度将超过此前的预测。【原文：China's home prices will fall at a faster pace that previously forecast this year and next, a Reuters poll showed, as support policies from Beijing struggle to help the property sector find a bottom.】

item.title: 中国 8 月工厂活动继续下滑
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，8月份中国的工厂活动可能连续第四个月萎缩，这进一步说明中国政府有必要加大对家庭的刺激力度，减少对建筑项目的刺激。【原文：China's factory activity likely shrank for a fourth month in August, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, reinforcing the need for officials to direct more stimulus towards households and less to building projects.】

item.title: 法国政治泥潭阻碍资产复苏
item.description: 由于政治僵局和政策瘫痪，法国的金融资产陷入困境，给市场前景和不断恶化的公共财政蒙上了阴影。【原文：France's financial assets are stuck in a rut as a political stalemate and policy paralysis take hold, casting a shadow over the outlook for markets and deteriorating public finances.】

item.title: 独家报道俄罗斯与中国合作伙伴的支付障碍八月加剧
item.description: 直接了解这一问题的俄罗斯消息人士告诉路透社记者，一些俄罗斯公司在与中国贸易伙伴付款时面临越来越多的拖延和成本上升，导致价值数百亿元人民币的交易陷入困境。【原文：Some Russian companies are facing growing delays and rising costs on payments with trading partners in China, leaving transactions worth tens of billions of yuan in limbo, Russian sources with direct knowledge of the issue told Reuters.】

item.title: 即使美国降息威胁到派息，热爱现金的投资者仍会继续投资
item.description: 随着美联储准备降息，现金的黄金时代可能即将结束。不过，许多投资类资产的拥趸们还是按兵不动。【原文：A golden era for cash may be winding down as the Federal Reserve gets ready to cut interest rates. Many fans of the investment class are staying put anyway.】

item.title: 早间竞标开始降息
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 独家报道：机构称英国英杰华合谋规避印度赔偿和税收规则
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份通知，印度税务机构发现英国保险公司 Aviva 违反了当地关于销售代理佣金上限的规定，该公司采用了假发票和秘密现金支付的制度。【原文：An Indian tax agency has found that British insurer Aviva breached local regulations capping commissions to sales agents with a system of fake invoices and clandestine cash payments, according to a notice seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官称无证据表明债券发行不当行为给纳税人造成了损失
item.description: 澳新银行首席执行官谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliot）周五表示，没有证据表明该银行涉嫌在债券发行方面的不当行为给澳大利亚纳税人造成了损失。【原文：ANZ CEO Shayne Elliot said on Friday there was no evidence that suspected misconduct by the bank over bond issuance had cost the Australian taxpayer.】

item.title: 优步首席执行官称，尽管处于劣势，但在韩国的发展前景广阔
item.description: 优步（Uber Technologies Inc）首席执行官周五表达了对韩国市场的承诺，并表示该平台将吸引更多出租车司机以促进增长。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc's CEO on Friday expressed commitment to the South Korean market, where it is an underdog to local tech group Kakao , and said the platform will attract more taxi drivers for growth.】

item.title: 对冲基金可能因特木公司所有者 PDD 的股价暴跌而损失数十亿美元
item.description: 集中押注中国热门电子商务巨头滴滴出行控股公司（PDD Holdings），可能导致对冲基金因该公司高管发表负面言论后股价暴跌而损失数十亿美元。【原文：Concentrated bets on popular Chinese e-commerce giant PDD Holdings may have led to losses in billions of dollars for hedge funds from a crash in its shares following downbeat comments from its executives.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将实现月度稳健上涨，美元因美国降息押注增加而下滑
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市上涨，有望在八月末稳健收官，而美元则面临九个月来最差的月度表现，原因是美联储几乎肯定会在下个月降息。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Friday and were poised for a solid end to August while the dollar was staring at its worst monthly performance in nine months, on the view that the Federal Reserve is all but certain to cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 7 月零售销售持平
item.description: 澳大利亚的零售业在经历了几个月受打折活动提振的乐观业绩后，7 月份的销售额持平，由于购物者变得节俭，服装和百货商店的消费受到打击。【原文：Australian retail sales went flat in July after a couple of months of upbeat results boosted by discounting events, with spending on clothes and at department stores taking a hit as shoppers turned frugal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司停止交易，评估监管结论的影响
item.description: 星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周五表示，该公司在澳大利亚上市的股票已停止交易，以便该赌场运营商消化有关其企业文化的一份尖锐批评报告的影响，并评估其对 2024 财年业绩的影响。【原文：Star Entertainment said on Friday its Australia-listed shares were halted from trading for the casino operator to digest the fallout from a scathing report on its corporate culture and assess the implications on its fiscal 2024 results.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注减少，美元将结束五周连跌走势
item.description: 周五，美元兑主要货币汇率接近一周高点，有望结束连续五周的跌势，此前强劲的经济数据降低了对美联储积极降息的押注。【原文：The dollar traded near a one-week high versus major peers on Friday, on track to snap a five-week losing run, after robust economic data pared bets for aggressive Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 玩家评估中东供应忧虑，石油保持稳定
item.description: 周五早盘，油价持稳，因为投资者权衡了中东的供应担忧和需求减弱的迹象。【原文：Oil prices were steady in early trading on Friday as investors weighed supply concerns in the Middle East against signs of weakened demand.】

item.title: Lululemon 在 "Breezethrough "惨败后快速推出热门新款式
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 的 "Breezethrough "紧身裤曾受到令人尴尬的评价，导致该公司将其下架，为了摆脱这一尴尬局面，这家价格不菲的运动休闲产品制造商周四承诺将快速向市场推出热销款式。【原文：Eager to move on from embarrassing reviews of its "Breezethrough" leggings that led Lululemon Athletica to pull them off shelves, the pricey athleisure maker on Thursday promised to fast-track hot styles to the market.】

item.title: 日本首都 8 月份核心通胀率年同比上升 2.4
item.description: 周五的数据显示，8月份日本首都的核心消费价格同比上涨2.4%，连续第四个月加速上涨，使市场对未来几个月进一步加息的预期保持活力。【原文：Core consumer prices in Japan's capital rose 2.4% in August from a year earlier, data showed on Friday, accelerating for the fourth straight month and keeping alive market expectations of further interest rate hikes in coming months.】

item.title: 日本 7 月失业率升至 2.7%，就业岗位增加
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本 7 月份的失业率从 6 月份的 2.5% 上升至 2.7%。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in July rose to 2.7% from 2.5% in June, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国央行的政策武器库
item.description: 中国人民银行（PBOC）的目标是建立一条更加市场化的利率曲线，放弃量化政策工具，帮助经济摆脱国家指导的银行贷款。【原文：The People's Bank of China (PBOC) aims to create a more market-driven interest rate curve and move away from quantitative policy tools to help wean the economy off state-directed bank lending.】

item.title: 中国的利率改革将是一个 "艰巨而漫长 "的过程
item.description: 中国央行希望转变政策框架，以信贷成本而非信贷规模为目标，但流动性风险和不合作的市场使中国经济难以摆脱国家引导的银行贷款。【原文：China's central bank wants to shift its policy framework to target the cost of credit rather than its size, but liquidity risks and uncooperative markets are making it difficult to transition the economy away from state-directed bank lending.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克和特斯拉赢得了对声称他们操纵狗狗币的诉讼的驳回
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和他的电动汽车公司特斯拉（Tesla）赢得了一项联邦诉讼的撤诉，该诉讼指控他们通过炒作加密货币 dogecoin 和进行内幕交易欺诈投资者，造成了数十亿美元的损失。【原文：Elon Musk and his electric vehicle company Tesla won the dismissal of a federal lawsuit accusing them of defrauding investors by hyping the cryptocurrency dogecoin and conducting insider trading, causing billions of dollars of losses.】
